channel.title: Attacks on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Attacks on Analyst

item.title: Ios Decrypting Applications Overview
item.description: There are several tools available that perform decryption of iOS applications. iOS applications that are downloaded from AppStore are encrypted.

item.title: Ios Intercepting Traffic
item.description: There might be several reasons to intercept traffic: just sniffing or also modifying it. In this article I’m going to describe basic techniques of intercepting traffic coming on and from iOS devices.
